005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.TypeMetapathException;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
013
014public final class ItemUtils {
015
016  private ItemUtils() {
017    // disable construction
018  }
019
020  /**
021   * Checks that the item is a node item.
022   *
023   * @param item
024   *          the item to check
025   * @return the item cast to a {@link INodeItem}
026   * @throws TypeMetapathException
027   *           if the item is {@code null} or not an {@link INodeItem}
028   */
029  @NonNull
030  public static INodeItem checkItemIsNodeItemForStep(@Nullable IItem item) {
031    if (item instanceof INodeItem) {
032      return (INodeItem) item;
033    }
034    if (item == null) {
035      throw new TypeMetapathException(TypeMetapathException.NOT_A_NODE_ITEM_FOR_STEP,
036          "Item is null.");
037    }
038    throw new TypeMetapathException(TypeMetapathException.NOT_A_NODE_ITEM_FOR_STEP,
039        String.format(
040            "The item of type '%s' is not a INodeItem.",
041            item.getClass().getName()));
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * Check that the item is the type specified by {@code clazz}.
046   *
047   * @param <TYPE>
048   *          the Java type the item is required to match
049   * @param item
050   *          the item to check
051   * @param clazz
052   *          the Java class to check the item against
053   * @return the item cast to the required class value
054   * @throws TypeMetapathException
055   *           if the item is {@code null} or does not match the type specified by
056   *           {@code clazz}
057   */
058  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
059  @NonNull
060  public static <TYPE> TYPE checkItemType(@NonNull IItem item, @NonNull Class<TYPE> clazz) {
061    if (clazz.isInstance(item)) {
062      return (TYPE) item;
063    }
064    throw new TypeMetapathException(TypeMetapathException.INVALID_TYPE_ERROR,
065        String.format(
066            "The item of type '%s' is not the required type '%s'.",
067            item.getClass().getName(),
068            clazz.getName()));
069  }
070}
